<dataType>String</dataType> <expression>BLANKVALUE( {Get_Flow_Metadata.vFlowLabel}, BLANKVALUE( {Get_Flow_Metadata.vFlowAPIName}, {Get_Flow_Metadata.vFileName} ) )</expression> </formulas> style="font-size: 20px; color: rgb(107, 146, 220);">Select a Flow Utility</span></p></fieldText> <fieldType>DisplayText</fieldType> </fields> <fields> <name>UtilitySelection_qc</name> <extensionName>c:fsc_quickChoiceFSC</extensionName> <fieldType>ComponentInstance</fieldType> <inputParameters> <name>displayMode</name> <value> <stringValue>Visual</stringValue> </value> </inputParameters> <inputParameters> <name>numberOfColumns</name> <value> <stringValue>2</stringValue> </value> </inputParameters> <inputParameters> <name>richTextFlagString</name> <value> <stringValue>large</stringValue> </value> </inputParameters> <inputParameters> <name>inputMode</name> <value> <stringValue>Dual String Collections</stringValue> </value> </inputParameters> <subflows> <name>Add_Component_Highlights_to_Flow_Metadata</name> <label>Add Component Highlights to Flow Metadata</label> <locationX>50</locationX> <locationY>3122</locationY> <connector> </outputAssignments> <outputAssignments> <assignToReference>vDeployMetadata</assignToReference> <name>vDeployMetadata</name> </outputAssignments> </subflows> <subflows> <name>Get_Flow_Metadata</name> <locationY>3422</locationY> <flowName>Flow_OneView_Return_Flow_Metadata</flowName> <inputAssignments> <name>vDeployMetadata</name> <value> <elementReference>vDeployMetadata</elementReference> </value> </inputAssignments> <inputAssignments> <name>vDeployVersion</name> <value> <elementReference>Get_Flow_Metadata.vDeployVersion</elementReference> </value> </inputAssignments> <inputAssignments> <name>vFileName</name> <value> <elementReference>Get_Flow_Metadata.vFileName</elementReference> </value> </inputAssignments> <inputAssignments> <name>vFlowAPIName</name> <value> <elementReference>Get_Flow_Metadata.vFlowAPIName</elementReference> </value> </inputAssignments> <inputAssignments> <name>vFlowName</name> <value> <elementReference>fFlowName</elementReference> </value> </inputAssignments> <inputAssignments> <name>vMetadataProcessingMethod</name> <value> <elementReference>Get_Flow_Metadata.vMetadataProcessingMethod</elementReference> </value> </inputAssignments> </subflows> <subflows> <name>Review_Flow_Resources</name> <label>Review Flow Resources</label> <locationX>314</locationX> <locationY>3122</locationY> <connector> <targetReference>Deploy_Changes</targetReference> </connector> <flowName>Flow_OneView_Review_Flow_Resources</flowName> <inputAssignments> <name>vFlowAPIName</name> <value> <elementReference>Get_Flow_Metadata.vFlowAPIName</elementReference> </value> </inputAssignments> <inputAssignments> <name>vFlowName</name> <value> <elementReference>fFlowName</elementReference> </value> </inputAssignments> <inputAssignments> <name>vSourceMetadata</name> <value> <elementReference>Get_Flow_Metadata.vSourceMetadata</elementReference> </value> </inputAssignments> <inputAssignments> <name>vSourceVersion</name> <value> <elementReference>Get_Flow_Metadata.vSourceVersion</elementReference> </value> </inputAssignments> <outputAssignments> <assignToReference>vDeploy</assignToReference> <name>vDeploy</name> </outputAssignments> <outputAssignments> <assignToReference>vDeployMetadata</assignToReference> <name>vDeployMetadata</name> </outputAssignments> </subflows> <textTemplates> <name>ttCreateDiagramDescription</name> <isViewedAsPlainText>false</isViewedAsPlainText> <text><p><em>future option</em></p></text> </textTemplates> <textTemplates> <name>ttHighlightDescription</name> <isViewedAsPlainText>false</isViewedAsPlainText> <text><p>This utility will identify custom screen components and add a "hidden" highlight that will only show when you are editing the flow in the Flow Builder. The highlights are designed to include the component API name.</p><p><br></p><p>This will make it easier to locate and identify individual screen components, especially when multiple copies of the same component are used on a single screen.</p><p><br></p><p>Different highlight formats are available along with the option to define your own.</p></text> </textTemplates> <textTemplates> <name>ttNodeReviewDescription</name> <isViewedAsPlainText>false</isViewedAsPlainText> <text><p><em>Coming Soon</em></p></text> </textTemplates> <textTemplates> <name>ttResourceReviewDescription</name> <isViewedAsPlainText>false</isViewedAsPlainText> <text><p>Select this option to examine the defined resources in your flow. These include Variables, Constants, Text Templates, Formulas, Stages, Choices and Dynamic Choice Sets.</p><p><br></p><p>You will be presented with a list of those Variables Available for Input and those Available for Output. An additional list will show all of the resources along with their initial or default values.</p><p><br></p><p>Additional resource utilities can be selected including</p><ul><li>Identify "orphan" resources with the option to remove them from the flow</li><li>Identify potential hard-coded recordIds</li><li>Reorder Assignment node entries</li><li>Add or change resource descriptions</li><li>Rename resources that were created when copying (_0 or Copy of) - <em>future</em></li></ul></text> </textTemplates> <variables> <name>colCardDescriptions</name> <dataType>String</dataType> <isCollection>true</isCollection> <isInput>false</isInput> <isOutput>false</isOutput> </variables> <variables> <name>colCardIcons</name> <dataType>String</dataType> <isCollection>true</isCollection> <isInput>false</isInput> <isOutput>false</isOutput> </variables> <variables> <name>colCardTitles</name> <dataType>String</dataType> <isCollection>true</isCollection> <isInput>false</isInput> <isOutput>false</isOutput> </variables> <variables> <name>vDeploy</name> <dataType>Boolean</dataType> <isCollection>false</isCollection> <isInput>false</isInput> <isOutput>false</isOutput> <value> <booleanValue>false</booleanValue> </value> </variables> <variables> <name>vDeployMetadata</name> <dataType>String</dataType> <isCollection>false</isCollection> <isInput>false</isInput> <isOutput>false</isOutput> </variables> <variables> <name>vDummy</name> <dataType>String</dataType> <isCollection>false</isCollection> <isInput>false</isInput> <isOutput>false</isOutput> </variables> </Flow>

decisions.label: Is This Also a Loop Element?

decisions.name: Is_This_also_a_Loop_Exit_Element
decisions.label: Is This also a Loop Exit Element?

decisions.name: Is_This_the_Loop_Exit_Element
decisions.label: Is This the Loop Exit Element?

formulas.name: fInnerLoop
formulas.expression: REVERSE( LEFT( MID( REVERSE( {!vOpenLoopList} ), FIND( ":", REVERSE( {!vOpenLoopList} )) + 1, 9999 ),FIND( "[", MID( REVERSE( {!vOpenLoopList} ), FIND( ":", REVERSE( {!vOpenLoopList} )) + 1, 9999 ) ) - 1 ) )

formulas.name: fRemoveLoop
formulas.expression: REVERSE( LEFT(REVERSE( SUBSTITUTE( {!vOpenLoopList}, {!objElement.Resource_name__c}&"]", "]" ) ), FIND( "]:", REVERSE( SUBSTITUTE( {!vOpenLoopList}, {!objElement.Resource_name__c}&"]", "]" ) ) )-1 ) & RIGHT( REVERSE( SUBSTITUTE( {!vOpenLoopList}, {!objElement.Resource_name__c}&"]", "]" ) ), LEN(REVERSE( SUBSTITUTE( {!vOpenLoopList}, {!objElement.Resource_name__c}&"]", "]" ) )) - FIND( "[", REVERSE( SUBSTITUTE( {!vOpenLoopList}, {!objElement.Resource_name__c}&"]", "]" ) ), FIND( "]:", REVERSE( SUBSTITUTE( {!vOpenLoopList}, {!objElement.Resource_name__c}&"]", "]" ) ) ) ) ) )
